items.sentence: Tom and Mary can finish each other's sentences.
Tom picked Mary up and carried her in his arms.
Who's the person Tom went to Australia to help?
When Tom was young, he preferred tea to coffee.
You probably shouldn't mention that to anybody.
You won't find anybody who'll help you do that.
You're not going to make it in time for school.
If you buy tickets in advance, they're cheaper.
Tom was called out for the way he treated Mary.
Tom participates in extracurricular activities.
I wonder whether or not Tom is studying French.
I'm going to be doing that the week after next.
Tom realized something had gone horribly wrong.
Tom is a truck driver, and Mary is a secretary.
The cause of the fire has yet to be determined.
I've only written three songs so far this year.
Tom and I accomplished everything we wanted to.
Competition is neither good nor evil in itself.
This book is worth reading over and over again.
Boys always want to play football after school.
Sooner or later, the hostages will be set free.
Tom was the only person Mary wanted to talk to.
Strange to say, none of us noticed the mistake.
If anybody did that to me, I'd call the police.
I think that Tom did that to make Mary jealous.
I didn't invite anyone other than Tom and Mary.
You can stop looking for it now. I've found it.
Tom said that he didn't want to deal with that.
Swimming across this river will be challenging.
All the passengers were able to swim to safety.
Where would you recommend that I pitch my tent?
Do Tom and Mary know that you can speak French?
Tom would kill Mary if he saw her kissing John.
Tom won't be able to fix everything by himself.
Tom let himself in using the key I'd given him.
Tom has just got himself into a lot of trouble.
I bent over backwards trying not to offend Tom.
Tom is by far the worst singer I've ever heard.
This could be construed as an act of terrorism.
We're concentrating on developing new products.
There's no official estimate of casualties yet.
Tom was kind enough to take me to the hospital.
Tom crashed his car the day after he bought it.
I got a text from Tom while I was eating lunch.
Tom walked too fast for me to keep up with him.
You didn't leave Tom there by himself, did you?
Tom also needs to be here tomorrow, doesn't he?
I don't really know how to pronounce that word.
Are you interested in going to the zoo with us?
There are three more things that I need to buy.
